metadata.title: CVE-2023-0927 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Web Payments API in Google Chrome on Android prior to110.0.5481.177 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
